```{r}

```

Data downloaded from OpenDataKC (https://data.kcmo.org/Neighborhoods/Kansas-City-Code-Violations/mnjv-uy2z), 

```{r}
violations<- violations %>% clean_names()
```


```{r}
violations<-read_csv("data/KC_violations.csv")
```

What's the range of this data; how many years does it cover?
```{r}
violations %>% count(violation_entry_date) %>% arrange(desc(violation_entry_date))

violations %>% summarise(range(violation_entry_date, na.rm=T))
```
